title: Game crashes when I try to enter any game
body:
I can log in fine but when I attempt to join a game this comes up

"A problem has been encountered and the program needs to close."

I tried having a friend log in from his computer and he could get into game with no issues so its something on my computer causing the issue but for the life of me I dont know what. My rig setup is

OS: Win10HomeEd 64-Bit
Processor: AMD FX-8350 (8CPU) ~4.0GHZ
GPU: nvidia gtx 960
RAM: 16384 RAM

This issue only started happening after i updated my nvidia drivers, i rolled back the update hoping that would fix it but it didnt so I am lost on what to do from here. Any ideas?

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like there may be an issue between your PC and the gameservers you're trying to reach. I strongly recommend we first ensure your local network settings are good by having you configure your network using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

If you still encounter issues with connecting to a game after taking those steps, please let me know.
